column2: "Mbrɛ esukookoo tse wɔ nsoɛ mu no
column3: Dɛmara so na mo dɔfo tse wɔ mbabaa mu."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ aperdua tse wɔ haban mu ndua mu no
column3: Dɛmara so na mo dɔfo tse wɔ mbabanyin mu. Medze enyigye kɛse tsenaa no nwinwin ase
column4: Na no nduadzewa yɛɛ m’anomu dɔkɔdɔkɔ."

column3: Na ne frankaa a osi mo do yɛ ɔdɔ."
hom mfa aper nkyekye mo werɛ: Osiandɛ ɔdɔ yarba akyer me."
hom nka ntam nkyerɛ me Hom mfa nwansan
column4: na ɔtweba a wɔwɔ hamu nka ntam

column2: "Mo dɔfo ne ndze nye no! Hwɛ
"Mo dɔfo tse dɛ ɔwansan anaadɛ ɔtweba: Hwɛ
"Mo dɔfo kasae na ɔsee me dɛ
"Nhyiren efifir asaase do; Nnoma adwontober edu
column3: Wɔtse atamram nka wɔ hɛn asaase do;"
ɔwo a ewɔ ɔbotan ne mpaae mu
column4: wɔ bea sorɔnsorɔm no n’ehuntsae mu
column6: ma mentse wo ndze; Na wo ndze yɛ dɛw

column3: nsɔ nkakraba a wɔsɛɛ wenyin nture no; Na hɛn wenyin nture no abobɔ nhyiren."
na meyɛ nedze: Ɔnyɛn no nguan wɔ nsukookoo mu."

column4: na yɛ dɛ ɔwansan anaadɛ ɔtweba a Ɔwɔ Bɛɛta mbepɔw do
column5: Ma onkodu dɛ wi ano bɔdwe
